post.author: 송재연
post.content:
the golf is so crazy whenever we play
but i review and remind the following steps, then smile

   1. Grip with deep breath
   2. Set up with correct spine, weight and aiming
   3. One-piece takeaway with maintaining triangle, low and slow club
       back
   4. Move lower body first, throw out your club and your head never
       move until your right shoulder touched your chin
   5. Enjoy and see the beautiful golf course after shot

have a nice game.
post.title: Smile golf
